Package golad.lib

This package provides classes and interfaces for observation and manipulation of GOLAD boards.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Board
    This interface represents a GOLAD board which's state can be examined.
    Move
    Represents a player's move on a GOLAD Board.
    MoveFactory
    Used by Bots to obtain the current state of the Board, to create Moves and to check them for validity upon creation.
    MutableBoard
    This interface represents a GOLAD board which's state can be altered.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CellState
    A CellState denotes the state of a cell on a Board.
    Move.Type
    Denotes the type of a move.

Package golad.lib Description

This package provides classes and interfaces for observation and manipulation of GOLAD boards.
Author:
